summary: Pasta is a popular food made from flour and water or eggs. It originated in Italy and comes in various shapes like long noodles, tubes, or flat sheets. There are two main types: dried and fresh. Dried pasta is often made in factories, while fresh pasta is handmade. Pasta can be served with sauces, in soups, or baked. It is usually simple to prepare and can be a light snack or a main meal. Plain pasta is mostly carbs and protein but low in fat.
title: Pasta
